title: Does zed get nerfed cuz of him being a evil guy in PROJECT?
body: Yes, ZED KEEPS GETTING NERFED D:

replies.body: And heres hoping theres more on the way!
zed needed a nerf especially after the qss nerf that buffed zed and forced some ad carries to reconsider their ap ratios and the viability of zhonias.

Ive had a Jinx in ranked have to build a Zhonyas...

That shouldn't have to happen just because of 1 champion.

to be honest I was talking about champions that had decent native ap scaling like kogmaw, miss fortune and tristana since otherwise ga would probably be a better option but yeah if the enemy zed is really good you really might need to build something like zhonias to survive.
Lol Zed may get nerved like 3-4 times already on practically on all his abilities apart from q. He will still be popular {{champion:238}}
